Event_ID.description: A unique identifier for the consolidated event, derived after internal consolidation (e.g., a hash of Source_Event_IDs). Initially null until consolidation.

Source_Event_IDs.description: All original event IDs from GDACS. For GDACS, this will typically contain the `event_id` as a single string.

Event_Name.description: Name of the event, taken from `event_name` in GDACS.

Event_Type.description: Standardized event type (e.g., 'Flood', 'Earthquake'), sourced from GDACS `event_type`.

Country.description: Country name. Derived from GDACS `countries` field. May be null or need parsing if the field is NaN or contains combined info like 'Mexico (MEX)'.

Country_Code.description: ISO3 country code. Not directly provided by GDACS. Could be derived from Country if required.

Location.description: List of sub-national locations or admin areas. Not provided by GDACS, will be null or empty array.

Latitude.description: Array of latitude values. Not provided by GDACS, will be null or empty array.

Longitude.description: Array of longitude values. Not provided by GDACS, will be null or empty array.

Date.description: ISO 8601 formatted date-time string, taken from the GDACS `from_date`.

Year.description: Year extracted from the Date, directly available as `year` from GDACS.

Month.description: Month extracted from the Date. Needs to be derived from `from_date`.

Day.description: Day extracted from the Date. Needs to be derived from `from_date`.

Time.description: Time extracted from the Date. Needs to be derived from `from_date`.

Severity.description: Severity of the event as an array of strings. Derived from the numeric `severity` field in GDACS but stored as strings. If multiple severities appear from merging, all are included.

Population_Affected.description: Number of people affected by the event, derived from `population` in GDACS. Convert float to integer if possible.

Fatalities.description: Number of fatalities caused by the event. Not provided by GDACS, likely null.

People_Displaced.description: Number of people displaced by the event. Not provided by GDACS, likely null.

Financial_Loss.description: Estimated financial loss due to the event. Not provided by GDACS, likely null.

Alert_Level.description: Alert level as an array of strings (e.g., ['Green', 'Orange']). If merging multiple rows yields different alert levels, they can be combined. If only one level is present, a single-element array results.

Source.description: An array of source names. For GDACS, could be set to ['GDACS'].

Comments.description: An array of comments about the event. Not provided by GDACS, likely null.

External_Links.description: URLs or references to external resources. Not provided by GDACS, likely null.
